baseline.name: Kara
baseline.background: Kara is an outgoing and creative marketing manager who thrives on social interactions and new challenges. She's naturally optimistic and enjoys helping others, but can sometimes take on too much and feel overwhelmed. She values relationships and making meaningful connections.
core_memories: Won student leadership award in college
Started career in sales before moving to marketing
Built strong network of professional contacts

relationships.family: Close with siblings, especially younger sister
relationships.friends: Large social circle, many friends from different life stages
relationships.colleagues: Well-liked by team, often serves as team cheerleader
